body_html: Except for error checking, it's much easier to implement InvertPermutation on GPU now that we have code for tf.scatter on GPU. A bit of refactoring would probably let InvertPermutation reuse the functors for scatter.
body_text: Except for error checking, it's much easier to implement InvertPermutation on GPU now that we have code for tf.scatter on GPU.  A bit of refactoring would probably let InvertPermutation reuse the functors for scatter.
body: Except for error checking, it's much easier to implement `InvertPermutation` on GPU now that we have code for `tf.scatter` on GPU.  A bit of refactoring would probably let `InvertPermutation` reuse the functors for scatter.
